name: The Last Outpost
summary: Ferengi and Enterprise teams beam down to an unknown world to discover who or what has sapped power from both vessels.

name: Where No One Has Gone Before
summary: Teenager Wesley Crusher and a dying alien are the crew's only hope for escape from a bizarre galaxy where thoughts become real.

name: Lonely Among Us
summary: Passing through a series of complex energy patterns, the Enterprise crew find themselves trying to solve the mystery surrounding the death of Assistant Chief Engineer Singh and the altered personalities of Lt. Worf, Dr. Crusher and the Captain.

name: Justice
summary: To learn the origin of a mysterious ship, Picard must get help from a planet where Wesley faces a death sentence.

name: The Battle
summary: A vengeful Ferengi captain returns Picard's long-lost ship, the Stargazer, after installing a mind-altering device.

name: Hide and Q
summary: Q gives the powers of the Q to Riker and tells him his shipmates wishes will be granted if he joins with those of the Q Continuum.

name: Coming of Age
summary: Wesley is put to the test as he competes with the other top candidates to get into the star fleet academy. Meanwhile the enterprise is put under the scrutiny of a star fleet officer that seems to be looking for trouble.

name: The Child
summary: Counselor Deanna Troi announces she is pregnant; the crew sets out to bring a deadly plasma plague to a laboratory.

name: Where Silence Has Lease
summary: A being conducting an experiment traps the Enterprise in a region void of energy and matter.

name: Elementary, Dear Data
summary: Data dons a deerstalker to solve a Sherlock Homes mystery in a holodeck recreation of Victorian London.

name: The Outrageous Okona
summary: A roguish space captain charms all; Data consults a comic about humor.

name: Loud as a Whisper
summary: A deaf mediator's mission to a warring planet is jeopardized when his chorus of interpreters is killed.

name: The Schizoid Man
summary: A brilliant, dying scientist who seeks immortality transfers his mind and knowledge into Data.

name: Samaritan Snare
summary: Geordi's life is jeopardized when an alien race kidnaps him; Picard is near death with heart complications.

name: The Survivors
summary: Captain Picard and the crew visit a isolate planet that is the home to two people who lived through a devastating attack. Picard then begins to suspect that all is not as it seems when the Enterprise is repeatedly attacked by a unknown ship.

name: Who Watches the Watchers?
summary: When a secret Federation observation post is accidentally revealed, a primitive culture ends up worshiping Picard as a god and prepares to sacrifice Troi to appease him.

name: The Bonding
summary: Worf takes responsibility for a boy when his mother, the ships archaeologist is killed on a away mission.

name: Booby Trap
summary: The Enterprise experiences a rapid energy drain that leaves the crew vulnerable to radiation exposure while exploring in a area of space where a alien race once lived.

name: The Enemy
summary: A Romulan warship thwarts attempts to rescue Geordi, stranded on a planet swept by electrical storms.

name: The Price
summary: Troi falls for a handsome delegate who uses underhanded tactics in negotiations.

name: The Vengeance Factor
summary: Picard offers to mediate a dispute between a peaceful society and a renegade clan that steals to live.

name: The Defector
summary: A Romulan defector leads the Enterprise into a confrontation that could erupt into war.

name: The Hunted
summary: A prison escapee claims he is a soldier brainwashed by his goverment to kill.

name: The High Ground
summary: A radical takes Dr. Crusher hostage to treat his injured Comrades.

name: Déjà Q
summary: Picard's nemesis Q, claiming to have lost his powers, appears on the Enterprise.

name: A Matter of Perspective
summary: A widow accuses Riker of seducing her and killing her husband, a respected scientist.

name: Yesterday's Enterprise
summary: An Enterprise from the past breaks through a time rift, altering the course of history.

name: The Offspring
summary: An admiral (Nicolas Coster) wants to remove Data's creation, a female android, from the Enterprise.

name: Sins of the Father
summary: Lt. Worf and his brother Kurn defend their family honor when the Klingon high council accuses their late father of treason.

name: Sarek
summary: Vulcan ambassador Sarek becomes temperamental while on the Enterprise with his wife.

name: Ménage à Troi
summary: The Ferengi kidnap Riker, Troi and her visiting mother.

name: Transfigurations
summary: The Enterprise crew saves a badly injured humanoid who possesses remarkable powers.

name: The Best of Both Worlds (1)
summary: The Borg advance their plans to assimilate the human race by kidnapping Picard and making him into their spokesman.

name: The Best of Both Worlds (2)
summary: Riker is torn between saving Picard or humanity when the Borg plan to use the abducted captain in their scheme to destroy Earth and turn him into Lucutus.

name: Suddenly Human
summary: Picard faces a child-custody dilemma after the Enterprise rescues an orphaned human child.

name: Remember Me
summary: When Doctor Crusher leaps into another dimension of reality, Enterprise crew members mysteriously disappear.

name: Legacy
summary: Tasha Yar's sister helps the Enterprise rescue Federation members held hostage on her planet.

name: Reunion
summary: Worf deals with a personal dilemma, Picard mediates a power struggle between successors to the Klingon Empire.

name: Final Mission
summary: Wesley goes on one last mission with Captain Picard that jeopardizes the Captains life before going to Starfleet academy.

name: The Mind's Eye
summary: The Romulans brainwash Geordi as part of a plot to drive a wedge between the Federation and the Klingon Empire.

name: In Theory
summary: While the Enterprise explores a nebula with unusual properties, Data becomes involved with a crew member.

name: Redemption (1)
summary: Part 1 of 2. Picard tries to keep the Federation neutral when the Klingon Empire faces civil war; Lt. Worf struggles with divided loyalties.

name: Redemption (2)
summary: Part 2 of 2: Suspecting Romulan interference, Picard gets involved in the Klingon civil war.

name: Darmok
summary: Picard encounters the leader of a civilization which communicates only in metaphor.

name: Ensign Ro
summary: A Starfleet admiral, unwittingly being used by outside forces, involves the Enterprise crew in a deadly conspiracy.

name: Silicon Avatar
summary: When the Crystalline Entitiy reappears, Picard and Data try to establish communication with it before it is destroyed by a vengeful scientist.

name: Disaster
summary: A natural force damages the Enterprise, trapping Picard and forcing Troi to act as captain.

name: Unification (1)
summary: Picard and Data follow Spock on an unauthorized mission to Romulus.

name: Unification (2)
summary: Spock proceeds with his quest for the reunification of Vulcan and Romulans even though he and Picard are suspicious of Romulan motives.

name: Cost of Living
summary: As the ship encounters mechanical problems, Lwaxana Troi takes Worf's son under her wing while she prepares for her wedding.

name: The Perfect Mate
summary: Picard finds himself attracted to a beautiful woman being given as a gift to promote reconciliation between two warring systems.

name: Imaginary Friend
summary: While exploring a rare nebula around a neutron star, the Enterprise's safety is threatened by a little girl's imaginary playmate.

name: I, Borg
summary: An encounter with a injured adolescent Borg gives Picard the opportunity to remove the Borg threat forever.

name: The Next Phase
summary: Geordi and Ro disappear and are presumed dead after a transporting maneuver from a disabled Romulan science ship goes awry.

name: The Inner Light
summary: Picard awakens after being hit by a mysterious particle stream from a type of probe/satellite the ship discovered, to find he is living another life on a strange planet.

name: Time's Arrow (1)
summary: Data is transported back in time to 19th century San Francisco, where he hopes to solve the mystery of his death after a Enterprise away team finds Data's head buried in a cave.

name: Time's Arrow (2)
summary: The away team after encountering Mark Twain and Guinan in the 19th century, try to solve the mystery of who and what alien is killing people in 19th century San Francisco.

name: Realm of Fear
summary: A skittish member of Geordi's engineering staff encounters a bizarre creature while in the process of transporting from another ship.

name: Man of the People
summary: A visiting ambassador conceals the deadly secret to his successful negotiations as he attempts to use Troi to further is reputation.

name: Relics
summary: The Enterprise discovers a Dyson Sphere, in the process they discover a disabled ship that still has a crew member on board. When beaming over to the ship, Jordi discovers Montgomery "Scottie" Scott in the transporter system of the ship.

name: Schisms
summary: Adjustments to the subspace sensor array inadvertently establish a link to aliens who begin kidnapping crew members for experiments.

name: True Q
summary: A young honor student serving aboard the Enterprise is torn between remaining a part of the crew or accepting an offer made by Q.

name: Rascals
summary: Picard, Guinan, Ro and Keiko experience trouble aboard their shuttlecraft and transport back to the Enterprise...as 12 year old children.

name: Ship in a Bottle
summary: Data is playing Sherlock Holmes on the Holodeck, a glitch appears and Lt. Barclay is called to investigate and he discovers protected Holodeck files. Professor Moriarty is then released and demands to see Captain Picard. Against the laws of physics, Moriarty is able to leave the Holodeck and takes control of the Enterprise.

name: Aquiel
summary: A Starfleet Lieutenant and a Klingon officer is implicated in the murder of the missing starfleet officer on a remote relay station. One of the shuttlecraft's is missing as well. Aquiel Uhnari is befriended by Geordi after he reads her personal logs during the investigation.

name: Face of the Enemy
summary: Troi wakes up as a Romulan intelligence officer much to her surprise. She then finds out that it is part of a elaborate scheme for Romulan dissident's to defect.

name: Tapestry
summary: Picard is near death and Q makes him relive a tragedy from his Starfleet Academy days.

name: Birthright (1)
summary: Data is zapped by a energy stream and has strange memories from during the time he was out. Worf hears a story that his father may not have died on Khitomer but may still be alive on a planet near the Romulan neutral zone.

name: Birthright (2)
summary: Data explores the experience he had while zapped, Worf is held prisoner by Romulans with the Khitomer survivors.

name: Starship Mine
summary: Captain Picard and a desperate gang of thieves are trapped on board the Enterprise while the ship is being swept with deadly baryon rays to remove radiation the ship has absorbed over time.

name: Lessons
summary: Picard becomes intrigued and then involved with a brilliant new crew member, creating complications when a potentially deadly mission arises.

name: The Chase
summary: The death of Picards archaeology professor results in a tantalizing mystery involving Klingons, Cardassians and Romulans.

name: Frame of Mind
summary: On a secret mission to a troubled planet, Riker questions his mental stability after experiencing a series of confusing vignettes.

name: Suspicions
summary: The death of a pioneering Ferengi scientist ebroils Dr. Crusher in a mystery that may end her Starfleet career.

name: Rightful Heir
summary: Warrior Kahless returns from death to reclaim the Klingon empire.

name: Second Chances
summary: Riker returns to the site of a 8-year old mission, to retrieve important research data is is unnerved to encounter his identical twin.

name: Timescape
summary: When returning to the Enterprise, Picard, Data, Troi and Geordi find that the Enterpise is frozen in time with a Romulan ship and in the middle of a core breach.

name: Descent (1)
summary: Data experiences anger for the first time when Borg attack the Enterprise, Picard then try's to track the Borg down while Data attempts to recreate the emotion.
